allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Separate image and video compression tools with context-aware UI

- Create dedicated video compressor page (video-compressor/index.html)
  - Standalone video compression with MP4, WebM, AVI, MKV support
  - FFmpeg integration with real-time progress tracking
  - Percentage-based and target size compression options

- Update image compressor page (compressor/index.html)
  - Remove video mode switcher and video functionality
  - Focus exclusively on image compression and conversion
  - Add context-aware guidance banners based on URL parameters
  - Update SEO metadata and structured data for images only

- Update main toolkit page (index.html)
  - AI Image Converter button links to compressor/?mode=convert
  - AI Image Compressor button links to compressor/?mode=compress
  - AI Video Compressor button links to video-compressor/
  - Update footer links to match new structure
  - Update copyright year to 2025

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
